name: @motivast/mizar
description: Eye catching, content oriented WordPress theme. Great for mizar or any site where content is a king.

scripts.bump:prerelease: NODE_ENV=production gulp bump --type prerelease --require babel-register --gulpfile tasks
scripts.bump:patch: NODE_ENV=production gulp bump --type patch --require babel-register --gulpfile tasks
scripts.bump:minor: NODE_ENV=production gulp bump --type minor --require babel-register --gulpfile tasks
scripts.bump:major: NODE_ENV=production gulp bump --type major --require babel-register --gulpfile tasks
